translation: Great souls when their will is active Do mighty deeds rare to achieve
explanation: (Though reduced) the great will be able to perform, in the proper way, deeds difficult (for others to do)
mk: அரிய செயல்களை அவற்றுக்கு உரிய முறையான வழியில் செய்து முடிக்கும் திறமையுடையவர்கள் பெருமைக்குரியவராவார்கள்
mv: பெருமைப் பண்பு உடையவர் செய்வதற்கு அருமையானச் செயலைச் செய்வதற்க்கு உரிய நெறியில் செய்து முடிக்க வல்லவர் ஆவர்.
sp: எத்தனை நெருக்கடி வந்தாலும் பிறர் செய்வதற்கு அரிய செயல்களை உரிய வழிகளில் செய்து முடிப்பவர் பெருமை உடையவர்.
gptExplanation:
Kural 975 is about the characteristic of greatness and its ability to accomplish challenging tasks in the appropriate manner. The verse emphasizes that those who are truly great have the capacity to perform deeds that are difficult for others, and they do so in the correct and ethical way.

The greatness referred to in this verse is not based on status, power, or wealth, but on the ability to tackle and overcome challenges with wisdom, skill, and morality. Even when faced with adversity or a reduction in their condition, these individuals do not compromise on the quality or ethics of their actions. Instead, they rise to the occasion, demonstrating their greatness through their actions.

This verse is a reminder that true greatness lies in our ability to handle difficulties with grace, skill, and integrity. It encourages us to strive for this kind of greatness in our own lives, emphasizing that the value of our actions lies not just in what we do, but in how we do it.
